The von Mises Distribution

Source: R/stat_tests.R
vonmises.Rd

Density, distribution function, and random generation for the circular normal distribution with mean and kappa.

Usage

rvm(n, mean, kappa)

dvm(theta, mean, kappa)

pvm(theta, mean, kappa)

Arguments

n

number of observations in degrees

mean

mean in degrees

kappa

concentration parameter

theta

angular value in degrees

Value

numeric vector.

Examples

x <- rvm(100, mean = 90, k = 100)
dvm(x, mean = 90, k = 100)
#>   [1] 3.98172020 3.87615885 3.89152847 0.15074044 3.67769003 3.98422260
